commitResults.messageTitle: Add initial skeletal version of Duke that greets user and exits
Add Scanner class to echo user input, exit when bye. Add indentations
Add user input text stored in array and displayed when requested
Add the ability to mark tasks as done.
commitResults.messageBody:
Add Task class.
Add .trim() to in.nextLine()

commitResults.messageTitle: Tweak the code to comply with a coding standard
Add Todo, Event, Deadline classes inherited from Task class
Add welcome message as a function in main
Add ability to add todo,event,deadline. Add catch all for invalid userInput
Update printing of Task (Todo, Deadline, Event), Update adding of deadline
commitResults.messageBody:
Add toString() method for Todo, Deadline , Event classes for printing
Remove getTaskCharacter() method for Task classes (redundant)

Update instantiation of Deadline object from userInput to have "by" attribute
Add basic error checking when adding Deadline to tasks array

commitResults.messageTitle: Add printlnTab and printlnDivider functions
Add toString() inheritance from Task class for subclasses. Fix minor white-space bug
commitResults.messageBody:
* Update deadlineDetails[0].stripLeading to .strip() (white-space bug)
* Update message from adding task to print toString() text instead

commitResults.messageTitle: Update the adding of Event instance to tasks array. Fix minor printing errors
Add task counter that is displayed when "list" command called
Add CommandManager, Task Manager classes, Add TaskEnum enumerations
commitResults.messageBody:
* Update main() to not include the bulk of the code
* CommandManager and Task Manager replaces what was done in main()
  previously
* Update code format to follow standards

commitResults.messageTitle: Update all magic numbers with finals (constants). Fix add todo bug
commitResults.messageBody:
* magic numbers in TaskManager
* todo bug: previously included the word "todo" when adding to tasks[]

commitResults.messageTitle: Add try-catch block in doneTask() method of TaskManager
commitResults.messageBody: * Checks if a valid integer (taskNumber) is entered

commitResults.messageTitle: Update CommandManager.executeCommand() while loop to do-while loop
Update listTasks() and addTaskSuccess() messages to differentiate between 1 task and multiple tasks (singular and plural)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Update tasks[] to be final
* Update comments to be clearer

commitResults.messageTitle: Add exceptions for taskManager.doneTask(). Fix adding of deadline and event date "/b" to "/by"
Update addTask() to include exceptions, add user-defined exceptions
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add addTodo(), addDeadline(), addEvent(), with an exception function
  each (addTodoPlusException() etc.) to call it.
* Add doneTask exceptions
* Add user-defined exceptions (BlankDescription, ExceedMaxTasksException, IncompleteInformation)

commitResults.messageTitle: Update exception handling multiple times from different methods to one method, add stripUserInput(), add getTaskDetails(), reordered TaskManager methods
Fix bug where missing deadline/event description is considered valid with /at or /by present
Add help function, Fix getTotalTasks(), Update exceptions messages
Add text-ui tests for exceptions and maximum number of tasks. Update runtest script
Update tasks array to ArrayList, Delete irrelevant exceptions
commitResults.messageBody: * Update related methods to use ArrayList methods

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for deleting tasks from list
commitResults.messageBody:
* Combined Exceptions handlign for deleteTask() and doneTask()
* Renamed to ExceedTotalTasksException
* Fix IndexOutOfBoundsException to ExceedTotalTasksException since
tasks ArrayList has flexible size

commitResults.messageTitle: Delete ExceedMaxTasksException
Add support for reading tasks from text file, displaying tasks upon starting Duke
commitResults.messageBody:
* $HOME/Duke/data.txt will be created if does not exist

TODO:
* Exceptions when Duke.txt is corrupted

commitResults.messageTitle: Update FileManager.initializeFile() to be more succinct, Reformat code
Add ability to append tasks to file after adding to list
Add ability to store tasks marked as done by overwriting the entire text file
Update append to data.txt methods with write method (overwrite entire file) Fix bug that wrote one less task each time
Update data.txt directory, Add catch IndexOutOfBounds and NoSuchElement exceptions
Fix bug that prints that task was done/delete when done index = 0
Refactor
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add UI class, refactor out all print methods from Duke to here
* Rename FileManager class to Storage class
* Rename TaskManager class to TaskList class
* Rename CommandManager class to Parser class
* Update "help" and "list" commands to have accept shortform

commitResults.messageTitle: Add exceptions handling for reading storage file, update error messages
commitResults.messageBody: * Line number of errorneous line in storage file will be printed

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor by moving parsing code from other classes to Parser class
